      • publishStatusPost

        public abstract java.lang.String publishStatusPost(java.lang.String message)
        Publishes a status post on the current active blog with the text body of message.
        Parameters:
        message - text to post
        Returns:
        id of post created

      • publishStatusPost

        public abstract java.lang.String publishStatusPost(java.lang.String blogName,
                                                   java.lang.String message)
        Publishes a status post on the given blog, as long as it is owned by the authenticating user, with the text body of message.
        Parameters:
        blogName - name of blog to post on
        message - text body to post
        Returns:
        id of created post

      • getFollowers

        public abstract java.util.List<TumblrUser> getFollowers(java.lang.String id,
                                                        int maxCalls)
        Gets all the users following a specified blog. Tumblr only allows getting followers for the authed users blogs.
        Parameters:
        id - id of blog
        maxCalls - max number of calls to api
        Returns:
        A list of users following the blog

      • getFollowing

        public abstract java.util.List<TumblrUser> getFollowing(java.lang.String id,
                                                        int maxCalls)
        Gets the blogs the authed user is following. Id is not used.
        Parameters:
        id - id of user
        maxCalls - max number of calls to api
        Returns:
        List of blogs user is following

      • searchUsers

        public java.util.List<TumblrUser> searchUsers(java.lang.String query)
        Description copied from interface: SocialMediaAPI
        Search for a user with given string. Returns a list of users of platform type that fits the query.
        Parameters:
        query - string query
        Returns:
        list of users

      • searchPost

        public abstract java.util.List<TumblrPost> searchPost(java.lang.String query,
                                                      int maxCalls)
        Description copied from interface: SocialMediaAPI
        Searches for posts matching the given string. Pages can hold up to 100 posts. To fetch all results set maxCalls to -1.
        Parameters:
        query - text to search for
        maxCalls - number of calls to limit to
        Returns:
        list of posts
